name: Purchase Payment Details Report
query:
SELECT
    -- Purchase Invoice Details
    pi.supplier AS "Vendor:Link/Supplier:180",
    pi.name AS "Purchase Invoice ID:Link/Purchase Invoice:180",
    pi.rounded_total AS "Amount:Currency:120",

    -- Duration
    pi.custom_dutation_from AS "Duration From:Date:120",
    pi.custom_duration_to AS "Duration To:Date:120",

    -- LMS
    pi.custom_lms_id AS "LMS ID::140",

    -- Circuit / Site Details
    s.name AS "Circuit:Link/Site:180",
    s.solution_name AS "Solution::180"

FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi

-- 🔗 Site linked via Circuit ID
LEFT JOIN `tabSite` s
    ON s.name = pi.custom_circuit_id

WHERE
    pi.docstatus = 1
    AND pi.status != 'Cancelled'

ORDER BY
    pi.posting_date DESC;
